                                  JsonPointer scope,
                                  SchemaParser parser)

                       SchemaParser schemaParser,
                       Handler<AsyncResult<Schema>> handler)

        Specified by:

      • resolveRef

        public Future<Schema> resolveRef(JsonPointer pointer,
                                 JsonPointer scope,
                                 SchemaParser schemaParser)
        Description copied from interface: SchemaRouter
        Resolve $ref.
        This method tries to resolve schema from local cache. If it's not found, it solve external references. It can solve external references on filesystem and remote references using http. When you pass a relative reference without protocol, it tries to infer the absolute path from scope and cached schemas
        Returns a future that can contain Schema or be null or can fail with a SchemaException or an IllegalArgumentException
        Specified by:
        resolveRef in interface SchemaRouter
        Returns:
        a succeeded future that contains the resolved Schema or failed with a SchemaException or an IllegalArgumentException

      • addSchema

        public SchemaRouter addSchema(Schema schema,
                              JsonPointer... aliasScope)
        Description copied from interface: SchemaRouter
        Add a parsed schema to this router. When a schema is added to the cache, a new entry is created for Schema.getScope() and, if you provide additional aliasScopes, this method register links to this schema with these scopes. This method is automatically called by SchemaParser when a new schema is parsed
        Specified by:
        addSchema in interface SchemaRouter
        Parameters:
        schema - schema to add
        Returns:
        a reference to this

      • addSchemaWithScope

        public SchemaRouter addSchemaWithScope(Schema schema,
                                       JsonPointer scope)
        Description copied from interface: SchemaRouter
        Add a parsed schema to this router. When a schema is added to the cache, a new entry is created for the provided scope, but NOT for Schema.getScope(). This may be useful to register links to singleton schemas. This method is automatically called by SchemaParser when a new schema is parsed
        Specified by:
        addSchemaWithScope in interface SchemaRouter
        Parameters:
        schema - schema to add
        Returns:
        a reference to this

      • addSchemaAlias

        public SchemaRouter addSchemaAlias(Schema schema,
                                   String alias)
        Description copied from interface: SchemaRouter
        Add an alias to a schema already registered in this router (this alias can be solved only from schema scope).
        Specified by:
        addSchemaAlias in interface SchemaRouter
        Parameters:
        schema - schema to add
        alias - the schema alias
        Returns:
        a reference to this

      • addJson

        public SchemaRouter addJson(URI uri,
                            JsonObject object)
        Description copied from interface: SchemaRouter
        Add one or more json documents including schemas on top or inner levels. This method doesn't trigger the schema parsing

        You can use this schema if you have externally loaded some json document and you want to register to the schema router. You can later parse and retrieve a schema from this json structure using this#resolveCachedSchema(JsonPointer, JsonPointer, SchemaParser), providing the correct refPointer

        Specified by:
        addJson in interface SchemaRouter
        Returns:
        a reference to this

        public Future<Schema> solveAllSchemaReferences(Schema schema)
        Deeply resolve all references of the provided schema
        Parameters:
        schema -
        Returns:
        returns a succeeded future with same instance of provided schema, or a failed schema if something went wrong
